sub_fields.label: Full height
sub_fields.name: scheme_full_height
sub_fields.instructions: Is the minimum height of the scheme block window full height. This allows us to position blocks nicely.

sub_fields.label: Block Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: scheme_block_vertical_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: If full-height is enabled: How does the blocks position.

sub_fields.label: Reverse Desktop
sub_fields.name: columns_reverse_desktop
sub_fields.instructions: Reverse the order of columns in desktop. In mobile the order will be original.

sub_fields.label: Image Wrapper
sub_fields.name: image_wrapper
sub_fields.instructions: The maximum width of the image in pixels.
